holidays.title: National Take Your Dog to Work Day
holidays.description: As you run out the door, don’t forget your briefcase and a doggie bag.

holidays.title: Ugliest Dog Day
holidays.description: When it comes to man’s best friend, is there really any dog that can’t be adorable?

holidays.title: World Refugee Day
holidays.description: For refugees, fleeing their home country is often just the beginning of a difficult journey.

holidays.title: Clear Your Drains Day
holidays.description: It's time to tackle a forgotten hero of your home – your drains!

holidays.title: Flag Day Argentina
holidays.description: The day commemorates Manuel Belgrano, the man who designed Argentina’s current flag.

holidays.title: Kouign Amann Day
holidays.description: Celebrate National Kouign Amann Day and learn to transform this simple tea-time snack into a delectable dessert.

holidays.title: Martyrs' Day in Eritrea
holidays.description: The day honors those who gave their lives for the country’s freedom.

holidays.title: Matariki
holidays.description: We’re taking a starry ride to New Zealand to celebrate a holiday like no other.

holidays.title: National Celluma Light Therapy Day
holidays.description: This holiday raises awareness about a non-toxic, non-invasive alternative to medications and surgical intervention.

holidays.title: National Day of the Indigenous People in Chile
holidays.description: Join us in celebration of this day which honors the unique culture of indigenous people.

holidays.title: National Flip Flop Day
holidays.description: Check out our fun suggestions for making the most of National Flip Flop Day.

holidays.title: National Hike with a Geek Day
holidays.description: Explore your nearest hiking trail with a geeky friend on National Hike with a Geek Day.

holidays.title: National Ice Cream Soda Day
holidays.description: Celebrate ice cream soda by learning how it originated and which flavors are the most popular.

holidays.title: National Take Back the Lunch Break Day
holidays.description: Want to know why you need to take a lunch break? Read on...

holidays.title: National Vanilla Milkshake Day
holidays.description: Vanilla is native to Mexico and it's the only fruit-bearing member of the orchid family.

holidays.title: National West Virginia Day
holidays.description: There is so much that West Virginia has that its residents can be proud of.

holidays.title: Nystagmus Awareness Day
holidays.description: Learn how you can contribute to improving the lives of people with nystagmus.

holidays.title: World Productivity Day
holidays.description: Want to be more productive? Here’s how to get stuff done today!

holidays.title: Alex Guarnaschelli’s Birthday
holidays.description: Alex Guarnaschelli is a huge food personality, and her talent has no equal.

holidays.title: Capri Bryant’s Birthday
holidays.description: Little Bryant is well-known for her adorable smile. Join us as we celebrate her birthday.

holidays.title: Dave Hawks’s Birthday
holidays.description: The talented singer Dave Hawks is also a brilliant photographer and owns a magnificent studio.

holidays.title: Lionel Richie’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s among the most successful balladeers of the ’80s, he’s sold millions of records worldwide.

holidays.title: Nicole Kidman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Kidman, who’s been a part of some of Hollywood’s best films.

holidays.title: Sage The Gemini’s Birthday
holidays.description: Nothing is stopping this incredible rapper and record producer; he’s the future of music!
